titleStmt.title: Forgetfulness of God the great plague of man's heart, and consideration one of the principal means to cure it. By W.D. master of arts, and once fellow of King's Colledge Cambridge
titleStmt.author: Duncombe, William, fl. 1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Simmons, at the Princes Arms in Ludgate-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Congregational Library, London.
